executable.title: Resample DWI In Place
executable.description: Resamples DWI image to structural image.
executable.acknowledgements: Funding for this version of the GTRACT program was provided by NIH/NINDS R01NS050568-01A2S1
executable.contributor: This tool was developed by Vincent Magnotta and Greg Harris.

image.name: inputVolume
image.description: Required: input image is a 4D NRRD image.
image.label: Input Image Volume

transform.name: inputTransform
transform.description: Required: transform file derived from rigid registration of b0 image to reference structural image.
transform.label: Input Transform

integer.name: debugLevel
integer.label: Debug option
integer.description: Display debug messages, and produce debug intermediate results. 0=OFF, 1=Minimal, 10=Maximum debugging.

image.name: outputVolume
image.description: Required: output image (NRRD file) that has been transformed into the space of the structural image.
image.label: Output File

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.
